debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. had total debt of $181,394 million. The company's leverage ratio was 7.35x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 30.5%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
